body.name: Clover 4-in-1 Modern Island Crib with Rounded Spindles in Olive, Convertible Crib, Mid-Century Meets Modern, Coordinates with The Clover Changing Counter

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Dream On Me Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 14 mins
features: 4-IN-1 CONVERTIBILITY: The multi-functionality of the Clover makes it a nursery essential; It converts from a crib into a toddler and daybed and you can also use it as a sofa in your young child’s room (conversion rails sold separately)

GROWS WITH BABY: With 3 mattress height positions, the Clover can be adjusted according to the age of your baby; Set the mattress platform at the highest position for your newborn and lower it as your baby starts to pull up to a standing position

VERSATILE DESIGN: Built of durable, renewable, sustainable New Zealand pinewood, the Clover blends clean lines and full side panels with the enduring charm of rounded spindles and tapering legs; Choose from two stylish water-based non-toxic finishes

SAFETY FIRST: All our cribs are JPMA Certified to meet/exceed CPSC/ASTM safety standards; Our products are tested by 3rd party labs for lead/other toxic elements to meet/exceed CPSC/ASTM safety standards

KEY SPECS: The Clover measures 54.25L x 30.25W x 36.25H inches and the maximum weight capacity is 50 lbs; For the best fit, we recommend any Dream On Me or Evolur full-size, non-toxic, Greenguard certified mattress
body.description: Dream On Me clover crib is a must have, inspired by mid-century modern. It's refined design offers simple clean lines, full side panels, rounded spindles and completed with tapered legs, this timeless crib will effortlessly fit into any nursery decor. This modern crib is designed using solid wood construction that makes it as durable as it is beautiful which converts to a toddler bed, day bed and sofa to accommodate your growing child (conversion rails sold separately). The crib is featured in three non-toxic finishes - We combined a breathtaking olive green with natural tones to create a sense of tranquility, modern white finish and natural white finish. Can inspire muted palettes or vibrant shades that are equal parts elegant and serene.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit worried about ordering a crib from Amazon, but the crib was delivered safely and nothing appeared to be broken upon inspection.It was fairly easy to put together although I would recommend to have a 2nd person to help just to make sure you dont break or bend anything while screwing it together.The crib is fairly lightweight, made from soft wood (I think pine?), but so far it seems sturdy enough. We have only had it for a few months and our baby is still little but our 3.5 year old will sometimes lay in it for pretend play and it holds him just fine as well.The size is pretty standard and same with the mattress height settings. We keep it pushed up against our bed and the crib mattress is just maybe 2 inches below the top of our mattress which was the same with our previous crib.Due to the lightweight, it might shift easily on hardwood floors, so if you're looking to use it as a co-sleeper next to your bed I would recommend to either have it pushed up against a wall or put a rug underneath to make sure it wont get pushed away from your bed especially when baby gets more mobile.The design of the crib is probably my favorite thing about it. Its just gorgeous. I love the mid-century modern design and the price is just right. Compared to other similar cribs out there, I cant see why you would pay more.I like the round spindles too. My baby has gotten his hands or legs caught between them a few times which is always a risk with cribs like these but since the spindles are round he didnt get hurt at all, just stuck.It's also nice that the short sides are solid, this helps keep light and direct air flow (like from a fan or AC) from waking your baby.The only negative thing I'd say is that there arent more color options. We ordered the olive green which is beautiful especially in contrast with the pale wood spindles, but a dark blue would have gone better with the rest of our bedroom. Would love to see the company offer more color choices to fit everyone's taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This crib is amazing! I was able to put it together by myself at almost 8 months pregnant, so I think anyone can do it. Instructions are easy to follow and the color is true to the photo. I feel like I got the crib of my dreams and my nursery is coming along beautifully now. So happy! Also didn't know that it turns into a toddler bed and full bed as well until I received the box! My little man will be able to use this bed for a long time. Love this crib better than the Delta crib I had for my daughter before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Extremely easy to build. Love the color. Very sturdy. Haven't tested with baby yet, but I will update in the future if my opinion changes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This crib was easy to assemble, took my husband and I about 30 minutes. The color is beautiful. Also love that it can convert to a toddler bed for future use. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this for much cheaper than it's listed currently, so the value was much better, but this crib really has a nice sleek design. It does have some off gassing so give yourself a month or so to have it together before baby arrives. We purchased the olive green one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we wanted
reviews.reviewText: The crib is exactly what we needed for our jungle inspired nursery. The color is exactly as shown in pictures and it’s super sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking crib
reviews.reviewText: Nice crib, one of the parts came scratched up but the company was quick to send me a replacement part. I’m not sure how sturdy it will be, time will tell. The only downside is that the paint scratches really easily and I wish they didn’t put all those stickers on it since they’re impossible to remove without leaving adhesive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the top quality of this piece!
